g:HTML.span: Drag objects onto the course flow area to add them to your course.

b:Tooltip.title: Unlock to edit this published course

cb:helpBody.g:HTMLPanel:
A course can be read-only for any of the following reasons:
The course is locked with the () icon. This means that the course has dependencies with data collection. The course author can unlock the course to resume editing, but must be aware that it may invalidate the results of the data collection.
The course is currently being edited. It may be open in another browser window on this computer.
The course was open for editing and wasn't closed gracefully. The lock will be released in three minutes and then this page can be refreshed in order to edit the course.
To gracefully close a course, either leave the course creator by going to another page (e.g. 'Take a Course') or sign-out of GIFT.
You don't have permission to edit the course.
